item.title: Re: can someone explain this crafting thing plz
item.content:encoded: potions-crafting-this page ought to tell you what you need to know about mixing items like wasteland stuff and also has a section on reduction of items. Hope it helps.

item.title: can someone explain this crafting thing plz
item.content:encoded: i dont get it, ive read alittlebit about crafting but i dont get it, is there a guide how to mix wasteland items:S i dont get it what do i do with the wasteland items broken glasses and ash stuff :S what are they used for? and what the h*ell does it do:S alittle help plz
